TopicTitle: How do I make a signature and post a profile pic in the forums?

Articles.Content:
I might be missing something, but i can't find where you post a profile picture and make your sig in the forums! Help!

(Also, this may not be the place to put this. Mods, feel free to move it)

I think it's either settings or My Profile button.

Are you using phone version?

All the info you need is in the forum FAQ:
